name: oci_field_is_null
purpose: Checks if the field is NULL

return.description: Returns TRUE if field is NULL, FALSE otherwise.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocicolumnisnull instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_field_is_null for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
